Topic.Title: Background image in a quest gamebook?

Posts.EditableText:
Can I make a background image trough all of my sites in quest for a gamebook?
I see where I can put in an image, but is it also possible to put it in as background?

Can I make a background image trough all of my sites in quest for a gamebook?
I see where I can put in an image, but is it also possible to put it in as background?
